ModMetaData.name: No More Fire
ModMetaData.author: kd8lvt
ModMetaData.description:
Going mad because your undead dragon set fire to your food stores because an immortal megaspider woke up in your freezer? Oh boy do I have the mod for you! NO MORE FIRE! No More Fire is a mod that deletes any un-tamed fires the moment they decide to exist. No questions asked. No More Fire does NOT put out any tamed fires, like Campfires, Torches, or Braziers, and I won't be implementing that, because that's stupid.
Thanks to Mr. Streamer for the idea! Roll1D2 / Mr. Streamer's YouTube Channel in case you've somehow missed his existence: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtowLlQSH6QRtp0-Z26U17A
